label: SENT
text:
In order for me to be
     eligible for me to go back to the States, even with the visa, I have to
     submit a pardon request and I have to wait for my 10-year penalty,
     which I will gladly do and eventually I will follow up, because for the
     senior manager position that I aspire for I need to be visa eligible,
     so
name: Cuauhtémoc
